{docbook}
<abstract>
 <para>This chapter supplies you with the basic knowledge of templates, UI extension, APIs in Content. Throughout this chapter, you can build your own content.  Also, with the step-by-step instructions, you can create UI extension, deploy a workflow in Content and do many different actions.</para>
 <para>This chapter consists of the main following contents:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.InsideWCMTemplates">WCM Templates</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information about Content types and a list of Contents used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.InsideWCMExplorer">WCM Explorer</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Introduction to the CSS files and CKEditor applied into the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions">Extensions</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Knowledge of extensions in the Content function, such as REST services, UI extensions, authoring extensions and more.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Dev_CMIS.Usage_code_examples">CMIS Usage code examples</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Examples of the CMIS usage code which may be useful for developers who need to access a repository.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Devref.PublicRestAPIs">Public REST APIs</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information (such as name, service URL, parameter, and description) of Public REST APIs used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.JavaServices">Public Java APIs</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
        <para>Information about public Java APIs used in the Content function.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Adm_CMIS.Miscellaneous_tips">Miscellaneous and Tips</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>A list of reference links for xCMIS project and CMIS.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
{docbook}
